title: 'To All the Boys I've Loved Before' star Noah Centineo shaves his head, fans go wild
text:
CLOSE USA TODAY sits down with heartthrob Noah Centineo to talk about playing Peter Kavinsky and new movie "Sierra Burgess is a Loser." USA TODAY

Say goodbye to all the hairstyles you've loved before – Netflix star Noah Centineo has a new 'do that's freaking out fans.

The "To All the Boys I've Loved Before" actor took to his Instagram Stories Tuesday to reveal that he shaved his head, flaunting his new buzz cut.

In one photo, Centineo holds up a coffee cup while rocking a blue shirt and a big grin, seemingly excited about his latest transformation. "I'm right here," reads the text on the screen.

He also shared a video that briefly shows off his shaved head before flipping the camera to show his cat, with the actor laughing as his feline friend sips water from the faucet.

This isn't the first time the "Sierra Burgess Is a Loser" star has switched up his look. Last month, Centineo rocked a bleached blonde beard.

Fans on Twitter expressed their disbelief at his most recent hair change.

"First Charlie Puth then Austin Mahone then Tom Holland and now Noah Centineo," one fan said. "STOP SHAVING YOUR HEADS PEOPLE WHAT'S WRONG WITH Y'ALL."

First Charlie Puth then Austin Mahone then Tom Holland and now Noah Centineo

STOP SHAVING YOUR HEADS PEOPLE WHAT'S WRONG WITH Y'ALL — Nelly (@AmeezyHadMeLike) October 15, 2019

"Why would Noah Centineo cut his hair? It’s already been a long week and now this," another fan said, lamenting "It’s only Tuesday."

Why would Noah Centineo cut his hair? It’s already been a long week and now this🤦🏽‍♀️It’s only Tuesday. — jj (@_QveenJC) October 15, 2019

"My friend said that Noah Centineo looks like Sid from Toy Story I’m dead," one fan joked.

My friend said that Noah Centineo looks like Sid from Toy Story I’m dead 😂☠️ pic.twitter.com/K4pUOyRKw5 — Kaitlin Weaver (@kaitlineweaver) October 15, 2019

Another fan said: "Noah Centineo shaved his head and I dunno how to feel right now."

Noah Centineo shaved his head and I dunno how to feel right now — Lauren (@5JustinSummer) October 15, 2019

One fan tweeted directly at Centineo, demanding answers about the haircut: "plz say u cut ur hair for a movie role or something and NOT that u just decided to get rid of ur curly hair for fun."

@noahcent plz say u cut ur hair for a movie role or something and NOT that u just decided to get rid of ur curly hair for fun — rip noah centineo's curls (@psterkavinsky) October 15, 2019

Centineo is set to star in the new "Charlie's Angels" reboot as "handsome nerd" Langston alongside Kristen Stewart, Elizabeth Banks, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska.

Sworn to secrecy, bound by sisterhood. 💥 Watch the new #CharliesAngels trailer and get your 🎟🎟’s today to be the first to watch it in theaters November 15th! pic.twitter.com/LgQ0KEdhzd — Sony Pictures (@SonyPictures) October 11, 2019

description: Netflix star Noah Centineo has a new 'do that's causing fans to freak out, a buzz cut that he shared on Instagram.
